title: Blended Remote Education Quality Management Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design principles and experience with online education platforms
context.additional_context: A course focused on developing blended-mode education quality management competencies in science for pre-service/in-service teachers, implementable in smartphone-based constrained technological environments

learning_goals: Identify and explain five quality management elements in blended (synchronous/asynchronous) instructional design
Propose at least three interaction strategies among learners, instructors, and the platform in an LMS-based environment
Develop a quality checklist for science education content incorporating VR/AR elements through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
